briefTitle: Biopsy of Calcifications Under Contrast Enhancement Guide (BoCCE)
officialTitle: Studio BoCCE: Ruolo Della Biopsia Sotto Guida CEM (Mammografia Con Mezzo di Contrasto) Nella Caratterizzazione Delle Calcificazioni Dubbie o Sospette (BIRADS R3, R4, R5) Non Associate a Masse.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Distance in mm between the biopsy site and the area of greatest malignancy/grade in the operating piece.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women with clinical mammography and screening recalls with mammographic confirmation of clusters of suspicious calcifications (BIRADS R3 or R4 or R5) not mass-associated will be included, with indication to perform stereotactic biopsy, evaluated at the Breast Care Facility of AUSL-IRCCS in Reggio Emilia.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women with contraindication to the administration of iodized contrast medium will be excluded.
